TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ParameterizedThreadStart extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ParameterizedThreadStart(obj As Object)
type ParameterizedThreadStart = delegate of obj -> unit

param.name: obj
param.span: 物件，包含執行緒程序的資料。

span.span: An object that contains data for the thread procedure.

summary.span: 表示在 上執行的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that executes on a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 managed 的執行緒時，會表示為的執行緒執行的方法：When a managed thread is created, the method that executes on the thread is represented by: - A傳遞至委派建構函式。A delegate that is passed to the constructor. 任何方法沒有參數並傳回`void`在 C# 或`Sub`Visual Basic 中的程序可代表委派。Any method that has no parameters and that returns `void` in C# or is a `Sub` procedure in Visual Basic can represent the delegate. - A傳遞至委派建構函式。A delegate that is passed to the constructor. 具有單一參數型別的任何方法，而且，會傳回 void 在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的子程序可代表委派。Any method that has a single parameter of type and that returns void in C# or is a Sub procedure in Visual Basic can represent the delegate. 執行緒不會開始執行到呼叫方法。The thread does not begin executing until the method is called. 或的執行緒上叫用委派時，委派所表示之方法的第一行開始執行。The or delegate is invoked on the thread, and execution begins at the first line of the method represented by the delegate. 若是委派，會傳遞至物件方法傳遞給委派。In the case of the delegate, the object that is passed to the method is passed to the delegate. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 和 C# 的使用者可以省略或委派建構函式建立執行緒時。Visual Basic and C# users can omit the or delegate constructor when creating a thread. 在 Visual Basic 中使用`AddressOf`運算子傳遞自己的方法時建構函式，例如`Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`。In Visual Basic, use the `AddressOf` operator when passing your method to the constructor; for example, `Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`. 在 C# 中，只需指定執行緒的程序的名稱。In C#, simply specify the name of the thread procedure. 編譯器會選取正確的委派建構函式。The compiler selects the correct delegate constructor. > [!NOTE] > 當您建立委派執行個體方法，在 c + +，建構函式的第一個參數是執行個體變數。When you create a delegate for an instance method in C++, the first parameter of the constructor is the instance variable. 對於靜態方法，建構函式的第一個參數為零。For a static method, the first parameter of the constructor is zero. 對於靜態方法，委派建構函式只需要一個參數： 回呼方法中，類別名稱所限定的位址。For a static method, the delegate constructor requires only one parameter: the address of the callback method, qualified by the class name. 委派並方法多載輕鬆地將資料傳遞至執行緒程序，但這項技術不安全的型別因為任何物件可以傳遞至。The delegate and the method overload make it easy to pass data to a thread procedure, but this technique is not type safe because any object can be passed to . 更穩固的方式，將資料傳遞至執行緒程序是進入背景工作物件中的執行緒程序和資料欄位。A more robust way to pass data to a thread procedure is to put both the thread procedure and the data fields into a worker object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 建立的執行緒和開始時間傳遞資料](~/docs/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time.md)。For more information, see [Creating Threads and Passing Data at Start Time](~/docs/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time.md). 委派支援只有一個參數。The delegate supports only a single parameter. 您可以傳遞至多個資料項目藉由該參數的下列其中一個：You can pass multiple data items to the by making that parameter one of the following: - 陣列。An array. - 集合型別上，如果所有資料的項目屬於相同的型別。A collection type, if all of the data items are of the same type. - Tuple 類型，例如或。A tuple type, such as or . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用執行靜態方法和執行個體方法的委派。The following code example uses a delegate to execute a static method and an instance method. 第一個委派由靜態`DoWork`方法和第二個執行個體所表示`DoMoreWork`方法。The first delegate is represented by the static `DoWork` method and the second is represented by the instance `DoMoreWork` method. 這兩種方法比對委派簽章; 亦即，它們需要類型的單一參數且不傳回值。Both methods match the delegate signature; that is, they have a single parameter of type and don't return a value. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 和 C# 編譯器推斷委派的簽章`DoWork`和`DoMoreWork`方法，並呼叫正確的建構函式。The Visual Basic and C# compilers infer the delegate from the signatures of the `DoWork` and `DoMoreWork` methods, and call the correct constructor. 因此，沒有明確的建構函式呼叫程式碼中。Thus, there is no explicit constructor call in the code. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart/VB/source.vb#1)]
